comments.text:
If you change size of text (Control panel -> Appearance and Personalization -> Display) then web content doesn't respect the settings. This is a part of OS integration.

I didn't check this problem on other platforms so filing against Windows 7 for now.
I'm not sure which component is suitable for this bug so filing it to General component.
